snippet: The flurry over Chick-fil-A, after its president spoke out against same-sex marriage, has given everyone from mayors to student bloggers an opportunity to win points.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column says that the flurry over Chick-fil-A, after its president spoke out against same-sex marriage, has given everyone from mayors to student bloggers an opportunity to put forth their views on the subject.
lead_paragraph: The flurry over Chick-fil-A, after its president spoke out against same-sex marriage, has given everyone from mayors to student bloggers an opportunity to win points.

headline.print_headline: Few Resist the Temptation To Opine on Chick-fil-A
headline.seo: Taking Sides on Chick-fil-A Is a Temptation Few Can Resist
headline.main: Few Resist the Temptation to Opine on Chick-fil-A

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
